BUILDS_HELP:
**__Builds__**

`gw2!build [character_name] (pve|wvw|pvp)` - Show the character's specializations and traits for the given game mode.
`gw2!equip [character name]` - List the characters equipment.
`gw2!privacy [character name] (private|guild|public)` - Allow others to query your build with [character name] @mention
BUILDS_NO_CHARACTER: You do not have a character named "%{name}".
BUILDS_PRIVATE: Sorry, this users builds are private.
BUILDS_PRIVACY_SET: Your build privacy settings have been updated.
